verses.verse: But in the <S%H319>last<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3559>established<s%> in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H1931>it<s%> shall be <S%H5375>exalted<s%> above the <S%H4480>hills;<s%> <S%H1389><s%> and <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H5102>flow<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> it.

And <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H1980>come,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1980>Come,<s%> and let us go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> and he will <S%H3384>teach<s%> us of his <S%H4480>ways,<s%> <S%H1870><s%> and we will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H734>paths:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> of <S%H4480>Zion,<s%> <S%H6726><s%> and the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> from <S%H4480>Jerusalem.<s%> <S%H3389><s%>

And he shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> afar <S%H5704>off;<s%> <S%H7350><s%> and they shall <S%H3807>beat<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> into <S%H855>plowshares,<s%> and their <S%H2595>spears<s%> into pruning <S%H4211>hooks:<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall they <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

But they shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H1612>vine<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> his fig <S%H8384>tree;<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall make them <S%H2729>afraid:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H1980>walk<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H430>god,<s%> and <S%H587>we<s%> will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> will I <S%H622>assemble<s%> her that <S%H6760>halteth,<s%> and I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> her that is driven <S%H5080>out,<s%> and her <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H7489>afflicted;<s%>

And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> her that <S%H6760>halted<s%> a <S%H7611>remnant,<s%> and her that was cast far <S%H1972>off<s%> a <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nation:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> from <S%H4480>henceforth,<s%> <S%H6258><s%> even <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

And <S%H859>thou,<s%> O <S%H4026>tower<s%> of the <S%H5739>flock,<s%> the <S%H6076>stronghold<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> thee shall it <S%H857>come,<s%> even the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4475>dominion;<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> dost thou cry <S%H7321>out<s%> <S%H7452>aloud?<s%> is there <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> in thee? is thy <S%H3289>counselor<s%> <S%H6>perished?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H2427>pangs<s%> have <S%H2388>taken<s%> thee as a woman in <S%H3205>travail.<s%>

Be in <S%H2342>pain,<s%> and labor to bring <S%H1518>forth,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> like a woman in <S%H3205>travail:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> shalt thou go <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>city,<s%> <S%H7151><s%> and thou shalt <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H935>go<s%> even <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> shalt thou be <S%H5337>delivered;<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1350>redeem<s%> thee from the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3709><s%> of thine <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> also <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> thee, that <S%H559>say,<s%> Let her be <S%H2610>defiled,<s%> and let our <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2372>look<s%> upon <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

But <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> they his <S%H6098>counsel:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he shall <S%H6908>gather<s%> them as the <S%H5995>sheaves<s%> into the <S%H1637>floor.<s%>

Arise <S%H6965><s%> and <S%H1758>thresh,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H7760>make<s%> thine <S%H7161>horn<s%> <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> thy <S%H6541>hooves<s%> <S%H5154>brass:<s%> and thou shalt beat in <S%H1854>pieces<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> and I will <S%H2763>consecrate<s%> their <S%H1215>gain<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and their <S%H2428>substance<s%> unto the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth.<s%>
